name: Caleb Cobra
description: Join the C.O.I.L.E ranks as Caleb Cobra, a strong-willed rattlesnake who wants nothing more than to protect the Maljan Jungle and prove his worth as a skilled fighter. In this small prototype, Caleb goes up against a duo of frog guards, the security measures of King Tad, a giant frog who has illegally declared himself king of the Bolgan Swamp. Experiment with Caleb's attacks and defeat the frogs.
